long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-syndtr-gocapability for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1254599
golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.fc22 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 22. https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1254599
golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1254599
golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1254599
golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.fc21 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 21. https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1254599

golang-github-syndtr-gocapability-0-0.11.git8e4cdcb.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.\nIf you want to test the update, you can install it with \n su -c 'yum --enablerepo=updates-testing update golang-github-syndtr-gocapability'. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-14045

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
